item.title: Diffusion Spectral Representation for Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Diffusion Spectral Representation (Diff-SR) enables efficient reinforcement learning by extracting sufficient value function representations from diffusion models, bypassing slow sampling and facilita…

item.title: Navigating the Safety Landscape: Measuring Risks in Finetuning Large Language Models
item.description: Researchers discover ‘safety basins’ in LLMs, proposing a new metric (VISAGE) to quantify finetuning risks and visualize how these basins protect against safety compromise during model training.

item.title: RankRAG: Unifying Context Ranking with Retrieval-Augmented Generation in LLMs
item.description: RankRAG: One LLM, dual-purpose instruction-tuning for superior RAG!

item.title: RefDrop: Controllable Consistency in Image or Video Generation via Reference Feature Guidance
